des: "Light, crunchy, round, buttery balls, with chopped nuts in them, coated with confectioner's sugar.   These look nice when placed on a tray in the mini paper cupcake liners."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).
Mix all the ingredients together with a mixer until well blended. Roll dough into round small balls.
Bake for 10-12 minutes.
Cool completely then roll in additional confectionary sugar.
